required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Cohort Study of the Body Constitution Among Type II Diabetes Mellitus Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Cohort Study of the Body Constitution Among Type II Diabetes Mellitus Patients

brief_summary.textblock: By analyzing the relationship between the body constitution and the progression of Type II diabetes mellitus, its morbidities, mortality and the impact of the life quality, we try to provide an useful tool, body constitution, to stratify the patients accordingly for individualized health care.

detailed_description.textblock: The study participants are recruited from the Diabetes Shared Care Network of the Taichung Veterans General Hospital (Taichung, Taiwan)

primary_outcome.measure: Body constitution of type II diabetes mellitus patients
primary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

secondary_outcome.measure: All cause mortality of type II diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

secondary_outcome.measure: Life quality of diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

secondary_outcome.measure: Diabetic retinopathy of type II diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

secondary_outcome.measure: Diabetic nephropathy of type II diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

secondary_outcome.measure: Diabetic neuropathy of type II diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

arm_group.description: Type II diabetes mellitus, body constitution

study_pop.textblock: 1000 type II diabetes mellitus patients recruited from the Endocrinology & Metabolism out patient clinic of Taichung Veterans General Hospital.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patient diagnosed as Type II diabetes mellitus by Endocrinology specialist.
- aged from 20 to 75 years old.
- clear conscious, willing to join the program.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Severe mental illness, which lead to unable to fulfill the questionaire
- Major surgical intervention,medical events (such as acute myocardial infarction, cerebral vascular accident...et al.,), chemotherapy or radiation therapy within past one month , which made body constitution measurement unavailable.
